mapper.select: select exorder.* from cor_express_order exorder left join cor_express_delivery_detail detail on exorder.id = detail.express_order_id and detail.dr=0 left join cor_express_delivery delivery on detail.express_delivery_id = delivery.id and delivery.dr=0 left join cor_driver cd on delivery.driver_id = cd.id and cd.dr=0 where cd.user_id=#{userId} and cd.tenant_id=#{tenantId}

select count(*) from cor_express_order exorder left join cor_express_delivery_detail detail on exorder.id = detail.express_order_id and detail.dr=0 left join cor_express_delivery delivery on detail.express_delivery_id = delivery.id and delivery.dr=0 left join cor_driver cd on delivery.driver_id = cd.id and cd.dr=0 where cd.user_id=#{userId} and cd.tenant_id=#{tenantId} and exorder.status=3

select cds.* from cor_driver driver left join cor_driver_scooter cds on driver.id = cds.driver_id and cds.dr = 0 where cds.status = 1 and driver.status = 1 and driver.tenant_id =#{tenantId} and driver.user_id=#{userId}
